summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed individual to appear and testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906. Failure to comply would constitute contempt of court.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell) for which the subpoena is issued.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Maxwell Case
events.description: The subpoena commands an individual to appear and testify before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on May 12, 2021, for an individual to testify in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
The commanded appearance was scheduled for November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.
Failure to comply with the subpoena would constitute contempt of court and subject the individual to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena was issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document is part of the official court proceedings in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
